arts.ttl: Juventus Exec Giuntoli Talks Kolo Muani and Vlahovic
arts.sum: Juventus will work on multiple deals in the final stretch of the window, but director Cristiano Giuntoli clarified that they are looking to add rather than sell and replace in an interview before the Club Brugge match in the Champions League. The post Juventus Exec Giuntoli Talks Kolo Muani and Vlahovic appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Arsenal transfer news: Gunners suffer Dusan Vlahovic blow amid £67m Benjamin Sesko dilemma
arts.sum: Arsenal have less than two weeks to bolster Mikel Arteta's squad before the January transfer window closes, with the Gunners being urged to sign a new striker amid their fading Premier League title hopes
